column10: Notes
Wind light but still very floaty, even above BL. Take off untidy.
Take off fine, didn't find much ridge lift in spite of good winds. Remembered to zig-zag to prevent overshoot on landing. Flew through a patch of lift but didn't recognise / feel it.
Take off OK although I think I had L hand lower when turning so more L brake. Soaring was fine. Landing I overshot spot I was aiming for.
Tow practice
Tow practice + spot landings
Tow practice + spot landings
Tow practice + spot landings
Tow practice + spot landings
Problems with reverse launch because not  too pulling gently enough. Went too far back for TL
TL OK but still could do with more tracking, less far back.
Soaring until sunset when lift turned off. Katabatic wind took me by surprise and I landed nearly downwind.
Originally nil wind then presumed wave. Bottom landed when lift turned off.
Deep snow gave me problems trying to collapse wall - got dragged. Then a short soaring flight at 3PM plus bottom landing
Light winds, bit to the SW.
Wind died after a few mins
Fluffed one TO (didn't run).
No wind, then v strong, then back to none. Got dragged on snow.
Very light winds.
Very light winds.
Bad take-off, bad landing :(.
Practice reverse launch after GH and slope landing.
Practice forward launch and slope landing.

column3: Ridge soaring, some thermal some wave.
column10: Busy site. Normal bottom landing closed.
Landed Treak bottom
Landed Windy Gap (loads of height).
Cycling low to high winds. Easy to stay up and had a tentative explore of the valley. Came down when feet and hands froze - bad landing (no flare).
Wind died after a few mins. Slope landed (badly).
Sunset; didn't make it to the car.
After a blown-out day at Bradwell
After a blown-out day at Bradwell
Struggled to keep aloft.
Struggled to keep aloft.
Forward launch
Wind dropped after 10 mins. (Bad) slope landing.
Good take-off; very rapid descent on landing.
Lightish wind, lost lift and couldn't find it again.
Landed windy gap
Wind became v strong & more Westerly just before sunset. Full bar.
Couldn't find lift. Slope landed badly.
Mam & Treak. Landed at Windy Gap
Landed below old road.
Landed below old road.
Landed below old road.
Landed Windy Gap
Lost lift; bottom landed.
Hit sink; landed R of top landing field.
Landed on landslip.
Landed short of Windy Gap
Slope landed / crashed - trapped by other flyers.
